Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: ENAMELLED; ENGRAVED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Scarab
Description: Small scarab with scanty details (head and clypeus), the prothorax indicated by two lateral incisions and with schematically depicted legs. Deeply carved prophylactic signs were engraved on the flat surface. It was placed on the left ring finger of an adult.
